name: debateit
description: DebateIt (name pending) is a website that allows random strangers from opposing political backgrounds to talk anonymously about a shared topic. There are no logins, no profiles, just choose your political alignment, choose a current event topic, and hit connect. You can end that chat with the stranger at anytime.

scripts.start: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
